title: Grateful Dead Live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on 1987-08-11
source: Patched/Pitch Corrected Audience (original shnid = 138303) FOB Schoeps CMC32s, mics spaced 8' -> Apogee mod Sony PCMF1 -> Sony Betamax; Taper unknown; Dougal Donaldson Transfer from his PCM clone of the master; Sony Beta SL-HF360 > Sony PCM501 > analog outputs > MAudio soundcard > Soundforge > CD Architect > CD @44.1 kHz; Subsequent transfer from CD > SFDIF > MAudio > Soundforge, WAV file converted to FLAC; Joe Noel: Label, Patch, Pack, re-Track in Audacity; Checksum & tags created in xACT - pitch correction and patches by Kevin Tobin
